website_summaries.verdict: Packs a lot of surprising features in a small, single din package. A good option for a basic infotainment upgrade.
pros: One of a few single din stereos with a built-in display panel for DVD playback and infotainment control
Comes with a removable front panel to deter theft
Compatible with various apps like Pandora and Spotify
cons: The built-in screen is difficult to view clearly from rear seats

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This radio is great! Don't listen to the guy that said it sucks. If you wore everything the right way then it works fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Lawsro

customer_reviews.title: All the features of pricier name brands at a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.text: The one I bought worked well but there was a flaw that caused it to reset itself without warning. I emailed BOSS and they immediately arranged for a return of the item. Instead of repairing it, They sent me a whole new system - same model but an upgraded version - free of charge. The new one works better than the older model. The sound is crystal clear and the touch screen works well using your fingers. It is packed with features at a very good price - as good as the much pricier name brands. The only con is the volume knob is small and needs a rubberized surface to make it easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Thornell

customer_reviews.title: POS
customer_reviews.text: Unit functioned perfectly until I went inside and went to bed. Got in truck next morning to go to work WOW radio will not power up. Go out drive a truck all week, go home take it out, check wires, all good in a bit it starts working. Next morning same thing again, now sitting at work, take unit back out let it sit on its face, check wires, all good, after sitting on face (face down) a while it just starts working with no memory again. Returning ASAP when I get home.
customer_reviews.author: My65442

customer_reviews.title: This stereo sucks!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stereos touch screen stopped working properly less than 3 months after purchasing it. The only thing that I can do is listen to the radio or if I'm lucky I can get the streaming selection. I live in the Colorado front range higher elevation and don't know if that plays a role in the failure in this stereos functions but I have to reset it constantly. I will replace it with a better quality stereo when I can afford to do so!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Henry

customer_reviews.title: Economical, but the user interface could be better
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the unit, and the display was pretty nice too. I ended up returning the unit because I didn't like the software interface. I wish I had kept it because the unit I bought to replace it has even more problematic software and a less impressive display. This unit doesn't show album art for your USB mp3 files and searching for songs is limited to simple folder searching. I wish it would have organized the mp3's based upon tag data. I am spoiled because I use to own a 2010 Ford Focus with Microsoft SYNC. If you've ever had that, you are spoiled too!
customer_reviews.author: David E Webster

customer_reviews.title: Works but beware of the glitches & small buttons
customer_reviews.text: Works well, although the Touchscreen is NOT very sensitive. Sometimes we smash our fingers into the screen for a log time before the function will operate. Also the push buttons are EXTREMELY small. Make sure you eyesight is perfect or you will need to pull over to make any adjustments.Mostly purchased for the backup camera aspect. Also glitches with that but have not been able to figure out if its the camera or the Boss Audio system.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Is a decent deck. The touch screen isn't the most sensitive thing ever but it's really sturdy. The Bluetooth works well and having a full band eq is wonderful to have available, works great with subs. The only thing I don't like is I can't get it to display song info from my Spotify. But ehh I can deal with that for how it makes my speekers sound, that's what important after all. Am happy with this purchase all the same.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: its not bad
customer_reviews.text: Ok , let's realize this thing is only about 100.00. Its cheap. But it works. Its not a lighting fast interface but it does function as it should. I had mine about a year and the screen stopped working. I replaced it with the same unit to save money and not spend on a big name. Over all I'm happy with the radio and feel its worth buying
customer_reviews.author: z28

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Beware .. It is not original
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my truck .Very low quality product . It is not original .. If you want to buy it make sure you are buying a chinese version of it .Wastage of money . my problem is i installed two months after i purchased and i can not return it now. I am also taking legal options against Amazon. Why are they selling fake products ? Friend's stay away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Nothing worked. The power would come on and sometimes it would play 30 seconds of a song and cut off. I know my speakers work because I have another radio to test them on. This is absolutely trash, and no one should buy this radio. Also, BOSS as a company has refused to contact me 4 times regarding this stereo. BOSS audio is not a very good company.
customer_reviews.author: Bhard

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend LOVES it! Unlike other reviews, the time was easy to set. I did buy the 2 year warranty just in case anything does go out. Fits perfectly in his 99 dodge ram 2500, even though I originally found this cd player on a different site that told me this one would fit, amazon was way cheaper! Easy to use, have to hit buttons on touch screen directly. Has a lot of features. Easy install, looks sweet! UPDATE: After 4 months the screen went black. Still works, just black. Quite annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Screen malfunctions.
customer_reviews.text: I was initially impressed with this deck for the reasonable price, unfortunately that was fairly short lived. Within 6 months I started having issues with the flip up screen not opening correctly. Shortly after that the screen itself started to malfunction. It started with the screen not turning on when opened. I would have to use the buttons to navigate to the blue tooth phone screen to get it to turn on. About a month after that even that trick wouldnt get the screen to turn on. Now the sceen wont even open anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Rania L.

customer_reviews.title: Decent single din headunit with a video screen.
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in a truck I inherited and plan on selling. Wanted a back up screen and not cut up the dash (it's originally a 1.5 din slot). Bluetooth acts up every now and then and the mic's background noise cancellation works a little too well for an old diesel while driving, it cuts off what you're saying unless you are yelling right in front of it. For the price it gets the job done and I don't have to worry about it when I go and sell the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob H.

customer_reviews.title: ... your picky about controlling your sound this absolutely no good I have no control over my subs I completely ...
customer_reviews.text: If your picky about controlling your sound this absolutely no good I have no control over my subs I completely turned the bass down on the head unit and the bass is still kicking away the screen isn't responsive at all it takes a few pushing to work the USB port is worthless it's not iPhone or android ready the aux lets out a buzz with plugged in oh and if your playing a music CD and decided to look at your calendar or anything else on you home screen it will stop the CD form playing for a second very annoying it's a cheap unit if your looking to sell your car this would be a nice add on
customer_reviews.author: Steve James Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Radio
customer_reviews.text: Great radio!! Easy to wire and install. Installed radio in my Silverado in 10 mins . I would highly recommend this radio to anyone. Great buy and would buy again. Packaging was perfect no damage. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Awesome Sauce

customer_reviews.title: Great stereo
customer_reviews.text: The stereo looks and works great. For the price I didnt expect it to really work and look so good. The DVD player works great except it doesn't play blue ray. But other than that the 340 watts is plenty of power for it to sound great.
customer_reviews.author: DEJAY

customer_reviews.title: Stereo is great, Parts missing Though
customer_reviews.text: This system is great unfortunately i recently went to the stereo shop to have the camera installed and they notified me that it was missing a wiring harness that included a hookup for the backup camera.
customer_reviews.author: BNoel

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this unit
customer_reviews.text: This item will not recognize ANY USB devices that are plugged in , am/fm radio works 50% of the time. The motor for the flip out screen will run when the device screen is in the closed position( powering the unit off and on sometimes will stop that)., blue tooth does work pretty good, touch screen sometimes does not function as it's designed, I would not recommend this unit
customer_reviews.author: ServTech

customer_reviews.title: The product does come as described, fits my vehicle ...
customer_reviews.text: The product does come as described, fits my vehicle perfectly and wasn't much of a hassle to install. That being said, I don't know whether I got a defective one or not, but the touchscreen displays upside down. It works and everything, but everything is upside. Radio function also freaks out, but I guess I'd have to sit down and mess with it a little in any case, just bummed out that I now have to find out what's wrong with absolutely NO support for the item!!!
customer_reviews.author: Delano L. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit, was able to hook it up quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit, was able to hook it up quickly. My only suggestion would be the display for the clock. It should have a function where you could keep it on rather than it disappearing after a few seconds. Also the clock display should be bigger, other than the tiniest font on the top row.
customer_reviews.author: birdie

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY wanted to like this stereo but unfortunately it didn't live up to the BOSS stereo I had before. 1. The screen was laggy and slow to respond to touch. 2. It didn't display the info streaming from my phone. 3. The mic picked up too much background noise when I would drive. 4. The screen resolution left a lot to be desired. 5. And last, but not least, the screen completely stopped working 2 days ago. Totally dead and won't turn on. Waste of money. I won't make that mistake again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rocked It

customer_reviews.title: Screen stopped working withing 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This unit is terrible. It has stopped working after only 2 months and the window to return the item has passed on amazon.com. The screen stopped working altogether. It is a waste of money when you consider that pioneer makes one cheaper that has more power in terms of it is louder and works much better. I just ended up replacing this one with a Pioneer AVH-X1700S DVD Receiver with 6.2" double din unit and i love it. It is better than the flimsy flip out screen and the quality of graphics is much more quality.
customer_reviews.author: R. Finley

customer_reviews.title: Good bluetooth streaming
customer_reviews.text: The touch is responsive, the motor is strong, the software interface is greatly improved (I had the same style radio from BOSS, got this as a replacement after several years). It's much better now. The Bluetooth signal is stronger too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BV9976B
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS SUCH A NICE STEREO INSTALL REALLY EASY ON MY 2004 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE LOVE ALL THE FETCHERS PLUS HAS A 7 IN SCREEN IN A SINGLE DIN PLAYS MOVIES DVD CD SSD CARDS 2 USB PORT BLUE TOOTH HANDS FREE CALLING HOOKED THE BACKUP CAMERA RIGHT TO IT SO WHEN I PUT IN REVERSE IT AUTO COMES ON GREAT SOUND TOO IF U WANT A SINGLE DIN THAT DOSE IT ALL THIS IS THE 0NE FOR 110 DOLLARS ITS A GOOD DEAL
customer_reviews.author: ladykat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome radio!!
customer_reviews.text: I think its a great radio. I've been using it a few months now and installed it in my 1993 Buick Regal. I love having all the options and different ways to playback music.Only gripes i will seem get, is the GUI seems to be a bit laggy which can get annoying while driving.When you use Aux it has a slight high pitch whine to it even after switching AUX cables. All in all the radio is worth buying and looks great! Pros -Multiple ways for music playback -Feels solid not cheap -Easy installation -Flip up screen/LEDS/aesthetics Cons -Interface can be laggy (14fps ish) -Whining noise with AUX (barely noticeable)
customer_reviews.author: Dangelo N. Marple

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the system up to that point
customer_reviews.text: Installed in vehicle rarely used. After about the 20th actual use of the radio, the monitor stuck mid way through the shut-off mode. I had to assist it to properly close and that was the end of that. I really liked the system up to that point, now I have just a regular stereo. Of course it was too late for a return. Something to consider if looking to purchase this particular system.
customer_reviews.author: EMR

customer_reviews.title: Very reasonable and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect radio for someone on a budget. The sound quality is good and the display is ok for its size, Having using it for over two months now every thing still works perfect. My two main cons Are listed below 1 - Occasionally when turning on the car, the radio's screen would fade to a blank white screen and i would have to turn the radio off then back on again. 1 - Not really a con but the remote has so much buttons that i do not use it, prefer the buttons on the radio
customer_reviews.author: George Fraser

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I like it if it works out we will be ordering ...
customer_reviews.text: So far my son likes this. We are getting it installedxin his truck tomorrow. Can't wait. My husband and I like it if it works out we will be ordering one for our vehicles as well. Can't wait till tomorrow. Once we get it in I will update review. So far 5 stars. Hopefully they stay. My sin is so excited as are we
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great unit, great value. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought an old SUV in desperate need of an upgrade from the stock stereo. The output from this is significantly better and the sound quality from the amp is great. I’ve always had digital amplifiers to run both subwoofers and newer speaker but this head unit is doing a great job without the need. The Bluetooth functionality is on point and it does a surprisingly good job with phone calls and clarity. Better than my wife’s newer and more advanced built in system to her car.
customer_reviews.author: ice4life1417

customer_reviews.title: Noise in the morning and when it rains
customer_reviews.text: It's a great unit but has anyone else had a problem where the unit makes a louder noise of what the motor that brings the screen out makes, It' only makes these annoying noises early in the morning and when it rains. Just curious because I love the unit but that does bother me Because the unit itself makes the noise not through the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley P.

customer_reviews.title: Please be careful for false claims of such product like this.
customer_reviews.text: This product was specified to fit and compatible with my 1998 Nissan pathfinder. Unfortunately, I set an appointment, took it to the stereo installation shop, waited for two long hours while the technician attempts to install the product. To my surprise, it does not fit into the dash board of Nissan as claimed which encouraged me to buy the damn product in the first place. Please be careful for false claims of such product like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's decent
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought it to install a backup camera in my truck. It works as expected. Bluetooth is nice. I play music from my phone and skip songs using the buttons on the stereo. The user interface is not bad, but it can be a lot better. If you want to know what time it is, you'd better be listening to the radio, otherwise it won't show the time on the screen. It can be a lot better, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have for some reason I'll have to reset everything when I crank up the truck no biggie for me hey it's 100$ stereo.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Completely worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stereo with DVD player and numerous options. More than needed for an older vehicle but would be even better in a newer car
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Hackett

customer_reviews.title: System nice, install.....
customer_reviews.text: Ok, nice system, however I did have to pay someone else to install it. And I had to buy additional items for the install. That's my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent upgrade to my low-tech vehicle!
customer_reviews.text: Pro: This system is almost everything I expected. Sounds great and the volume level equals that of the OEM radio. Great value. Attaches to a backup camera too. It can connect to the steering wheel controls (be I don't have any to test how well it works). Con: The Bluetooth hands free is a little primitive. It does not use voice commands. Does not interface with my iPhone contacts (or any other make phone, I believe). You have to touch dial each call. (redial works).
customer_reviews.author: Camper1

customer_reviews.title: Stuck monitor
customer_reviews.text: Works well on the audio side but the monitor stopped retracting 2 days after install.... Buyer beware....
customer_reviews.author: kdiesel

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by the quality
customer_reviews.text: This deck has been excellent. Easy to use and easy to install. Decent sound quality. Bluetooth connects quickly and easily, video is clear and bright. Ensure proper clearance above unit for screen. Screen has motorized angle adjustments as well. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit in dash well.
customer_reviews.text: Measured before installment, didn't fit in dash. Also wiring harness didn't match up well with my original unit. May have to purchase.Ordered different model. Appeared to be a good unit. Returned in unused condition.
customer_reviews.author: Coultergeist

customer_reviews.title: Pretty legit
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little more user friendly, power cable has juggled out a few times, other than that it does everything it’s supposed to to.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Boss is the way to go. Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit! It's simple and it just works! Boss is a great brand and I would know. I have many products of theirs in two of my vehicles. This unit is ranked high for many reasons so just do it and buy it. I promise you Boss is performance and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: it is a nice head unit but it dose have a few kinks ...
customer_reviews.text: it is a nice head unit but it dose have a few kinks my usb port dose not work it actually made the screen glitch, and freez. The sceen sometime when I turn the truck on opens to far and gose black. Alls I had to do was turn it off and backon agen and it was fine. I don't use the usb so is fine for me and with it opening to far that has only happend twice in the year that I have had it and it a little lound on start up but other than that I like. I have a back up alson that's is plugged in to this and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of radio for a small price. I am very satisfied so far. The Bluetooth is very easy to connect for android or iPhone. I am really glad I went with this product instead of some overpriced head unit. Great DVD picture, touch screen is perfect. Pros- for perfect in my 99 silverado Con-corner of screen will hit shifter when it comes out so be careful Pro- very easy to install, comes with everything you need Con- wires on radio plug are very small and flimsy. Be carful I WOULD recommend this radio to anyone. Going to buy another one for my girlfriends jeep.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McArthur

customer_reviews.title: Not cool stereo
customer_reviews.text: 2017 update screen quit line only warrenty you have to pull steep send in wait up to 6 weeks for repair or replacement and that sucks. 2015. Cool stereo work well. On 02 Tahoe screen does hit shifter needs spacers and some crafting to make fit. Blue tooth takes some patience not sure why it does want to connect to Iphone 5s (could be me). I would recommend this product and a wiring harness along with it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bad software makes bad radio
customer_reviews.text: The software is very buggy. Screen won't turn on half the time, crashes, and gets stuck in reboot cycles. The audio is pretty good. Screen looks good, but is very unresponsive. GUI is not very user friendly either. Pretty much every issue would be solved with better programming all around.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dissapointed.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS RADIO IS A PIECE OF JUNK. My car died, when it was below -20° outside. Went to start my car, and when it turned on the radio didnt. And it wasn't a fuse because I'd put in the old radio and it had worked. Then I went to return this itrm and still havent recived the payment. So im out $120 . Pretty dissapointed. Don't make the same mistake I did in buying this radio. I'd resort to a different radio if I were you. 😊
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This radio is great! I'm not a big fan of boss audio and I was surprised with this. Looks great, seems like a good product material wise like it just seemed more sturdy than I expected, and it sounds good to. Works very well. Grey features.
customer_reviews.author: byron

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product as a gift to my brother ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a gift to my brother who lives in South America,a technician guy did the installation in his car,the first two day this car radio worked perfectly but then the 7" screen opens up and that's it,it get stuck and don't return to it's original position even when the radio is off, I spend one month vacations in South America and now that I'm back I can't return this item because the return due date already expire while I was out of the country.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont do it
customer_reviews.text: Well I liked the price liked the looks of what i got to see FOR ONLY 24 HRS . Then went out next day no working . This is my 2nd BOSS AND THEY R JUNK. IF YOU SEE BOSS ON ANY THING KEEP LOOKING DONT BUY IT. And Boss customer service is complete crap as well.
customer_reviews.author: james Jones

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good, good picture quality, easy to install and controls are well laid out. Biggest drawback is that the screen flip up motor stopped operating after less than 2 months of use. Screen is now stuck in the open position fortunately, but the lack of full functionality is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kreitler

customer_reviews.title: Great radio for the the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had it about 2 months now and is still running great. Does everything it should the right way. Hooked up a rear view camera and has great quality. Speakers get decently loud with no distortion. For those who hear a buzzing noise it may be when you are charging your phone and have it plugged into aux, it can create a high pitched noise but typically the music over powers it. This is a problem with the phone and not the radio. It outstanding for the price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Dale

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Didn’t want to alter my dash with a double din, but needed a screen for a backup camera, so this was a perfect option.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Great radio.
customer_reviews.text: Just a good loud radio with all the bells and whistles, and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Wild willy 95

customer_reviews.title: Blaaah
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. However sound dont work. And no email back from amazon or the seller in a week. Already went had it looked at and sound circuit bad.. So had shop install better one. Slow customer service or mayne none at all
customer_reviews.author: Floyd anxrus

customer_reviews.title: Check your wires even if they're new
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review earlier saying that I wasn't getting sound turns out I discovered what it was it wasn't the radio it was a wire defect even though it was a new wire that's why I didn't suspect The Wire plus when I turn it on again there must have been a setting a mute button somewhere that I didn't know about Bluetooth
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok unit, it works good, tv is surprisingly good quality. but does have a couple of things.....i wish it has an external micro for the phone, the built in microphone isn't all the great. The volume change from 6 to 7 is a really big difference 7 sounds like a 10
customer_reviews.author: Miguel cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent radio for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent radio for the price! It was easy to install. I have mine in a 1998 Ford Windstar. I just have to remember to wait for the screen to come out before I put the vehicle into drive or the gear shift gets in the way. If I happen to forget, I pull the gear shift towards me real quick to give room for the screen to come up.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hand

customer_reviews.title: Make sure it has room to flip out.
customer_reviews.text: Good product and good price. Make sure it has room to flip out. I may have to modify it's fit so it can flip out on my mustang.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Harriss

customer_reviews.title: Need a radio for car
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for four months and then started to back fire alot
customer_reviews.author: samuel chavez

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: It sucks waste of money sounds good for 2months this is the second one I bought in 2 months and checked all the fuses and wiring does not turn on anymore screen doesn't slid out anymore and I'm not buying another also the light will flash if u hit reset after that still no turn on
customer_reviews.author: mark myers

customer_reviews.title: Good back up screenand very Lloyd sound
customer_reviews.text: The first unit quit after turning it on 3 times and it ate my DVD but Amazon quickly replaced both and so far it has worked great,i love how the screen comes out when i put the car inn reverse and goes back in when i go to drive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The screen was not responsive most of the time. The volume hesitated and then went real loud was not real good on volume that was enough for me However the place I bought it from was really good although they haven't contacted me back to give me my shipping back what was real polite
customer_reviews.author: lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: The worst is, the AM side has bad frequency and a lot of times you have two or three stations at the same time. FM is ok, if you play cd, sd card, usb, the info on the screen is really small, you can't see, replaced with another brand
customer_reviews.author: D. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: grrr
customer_reviews.text: First off the radio has a very loud fan. The dvd feature only works with when the parking break is engaged. Blue tooth cuts out and people complain they can't hear me when using the phone feature. I can't get decent signal for my radio reception either. I've replaced EVERYTHING trying to get this to work. Very disappointed the fact that I can make the LEDs pink is the only positive thing about it.
customer_reviews.author: jami

customer_reviews.title: Must be something better.....but it looks cool
customer_reviews.text: Screen motor went out after 2 uses on the same day as installation...waiting for regular ups return label...for a while now
customer_reviews.author: IT-Pro

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Tried hooking it up, I always install aftermarket radios in cars. The wiring harness got stuck in the back of the radio, once I was able to pinch the broken tab to release it, I noticed the positive wire was completely disconnected. Never got to use the product I payed for
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. The first one did not work and I ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The first one did not work and I had to return it and wait for another one that so far is working ok.
customer_reviews.author: TAS

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommened! Great Product for the Price with Incredible Value!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price! A solid alternative to the standard double-din screen setup at a very reasonable cost! This thing does it all from playing a DVD to reading USB files for songs, you name it! Highly recommend to anyone looking at purchasing an aftermarket receiver with a screen. Can't find anything else like it under $200! Would purchase again in a heartbeat for another vehicle. This product offers an excellent value to the consumer!
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Great radio with excellent sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install in my Ram 1500, only issue is there is no real instructions of how to hook it up. Still trying to figure out where to wire in the reverse gear wire...
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M Tangedahl

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: At first i loved it but after a month it started going straight down hill. I would then have to pull my dash apart and unplug it and plug it back in for it to work as it would shut off and not turn back on. And the touch screen was crap. Touch feature would barely work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch screen h.u. from boss
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little head unit. I only have one issue. The user interface is a little hard to operate and takes some getting used to. But I guess that's with anything. Once you figure out where everything is tho its a nice little head unit. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Ok radio I like all the features but it glitches out randomly
customer_reviews.text: Ok radio I like all the features but it glitches out randomly. That said I mean maybe once every other week and I have to reset and reprogram it when it happens. All that said great power output and clear sounding radio Bluetooth works great. As well as all the other features. I also like the built in USB charging cord that comes out of the back I was able to run it all the way to my middle console
customer_reviews.author: Bailey_reachingout

customer_reviews.title: Painless. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. Installed in 02 Jeep Grand Cherokee with oem Infinity amp. Wiring and setup is easy. All the audio tuning is awesome. Several more ways to adjust the audio than most radios. Clear picture, Bluetooth works great. Overall painless. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth is garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Feels cheap but then again its a cheap radio. Bluetooth cuts out all the time. The microphone for the Bluetooth worked about a total of 3 times. Pain in th ass to listen to blur tooth music cuz it'll go in streaks of cutting out for a bout 5 seconds every 10 seconds. Sometimes it won't but sometimes I'd does the whole time your driving. Easy to bypass the park brake to watch movies. Decent sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... year old got this for Christmas and is in love with it
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old got this for Christmas and is in love with it. The screen is crystal clear and he sit in his car just to listen to music great value for the outcome
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Great cd player
customer_reviews.text: I love the cd player its was a great purchase those other nah sayers must not know how to hook it up
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic player for the price! Easiest stereo install ever with an additional Metra harness. Definitely recommend, I would absolutely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Boss is not good quality.. it's a flee market brand. Radio is made very cheaply
customer_reviews.author: Vortex Audio

customer_reviews.title: The shop owner told me Boss radios were no good. I just wanted to have sound in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the radio as a gift. Had it professionally installed. The shop owner told me Boss radios were no good. I just wanted to have sound in my work car so didn't really matter. They installed it and said check it out. No power. They opened everything back up and it worked. Drove with tunes for about 5 hours then it stopped again. This time for good. I am returning for a refund. Will only buy from shop from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Boothe

customer_reviews.title: Love it revived mine today
customer_reviews.text: I love the product I received it today and was a little tricky to hook up but if you know what your doing it’s not a problem works great screen is great quality but be aware chevy guys it will hit it shifter if in installed correctly but over all great product would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these at the same time for my two vehicles. One was DOA, one would light up but do nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: you wiah

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy! Awesome System!!
customer_reviews.text: Hook up was Easy! Motorized screen Is Powerful and works great!!...Nothing Bad to say here!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Creed

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 week
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Had this for 7 weeks. Installed it in a vehicle that is used 2ce a week. 6 weeks in the left side does nothing but buzzzzzzz. Thought maybe a wiring problem. Checked and no. Beyond Amazon return. Will contact manufacturer for warranty, but not holding my breath. This BOSS unit should be fired.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Trnka

customer_reviews.title: I would really like to figure out how to make the clock the ...
customer_reviews.text: I would really like to figure out how to make the clock the biggest thing on the screen, instead of the radio station. But, it's a great radio and I can hear clearly using the blue tooth, as well as others can hear me too!
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: It’s an amazing stereo
customer_reviews.text: I like that I don’t have to conect my phone to listen and make calls
customer_reviews.author: Juan Adalberto Gonzalez Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Not Bad for the price. I installed it into my 09 FreightLiner Cascadia & looks & Lights up real nice & has a good sound to it & I like the Eq built in. 🤘👍
customer_reviews.author: Jojo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love the radio would recommend, I used this for my boat and it’s an easy installation
customer_reviews.author: Michael gabriele

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Work great at first then the screen got stuck and to return it.
customer_reviews.author: christina becker

customer_reviews.title: Don't work
customer_reviews.text: This radio is a peice of crap. Installed for 3 days, worked great now wont turn on or do anything all wiring is good but nothing. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Arhh

customer_reviews.title: JUNK DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This item was installed and after installed the USB port did not work after 2 days of being in the car came out one morning and the screen was scattered WORSE purchase ever If you call the company and wait forever to only leave a message to call you back they will not call back Dealt with amazon on this product what a nightmare
customer_reviews.author: Sean P.

customer_reviews.title: This stereo has froze on me two times. Once ...
customer_reviews.text: This stereo has froze on me two times. Once I pushed the reset button in the front, and one time I was on the phone when I started my truck and the Bluetooth kicked in and opened the screen. So what I'm saying is this thing wants to play music!!! I would buy it again for another car of mine.
customer_reviews.author: McHammer

customer_reviews.title: I loved the product
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product.. until it just stopped working a week ago, seriously the thing just won't power up. I checked that the connections were still good and that the power from my car was still good. It has only been 2 months. I don't see an option to return it but like I said until then I loved the product. If you are reading this, hit me up. I want the working version.
customer_reviews.author: Brita Carlblom

customer_reviews.title: Works great the camera wire on head unit needs to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great the camera wire on head unit needs to be run to the taillight wire to be sure,so it knows when to turn on if you connect a backup camera the reaction time on unit is a little slow but a great unit for the price. Subwoofer remote wire needs to be hooked up to power antenna
customer_reviews.author: J Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice radio for price, everything works fine except the small lid screen doesn't work. But overall I can live with that for the sound quality it produces
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: The first unit I had only lasted a couple of ...
customer_reviews.text: The first unit I had only lasted a couple of months before it started cutting in and out and the screen would only open occasionally. It was replaced by the seller and the second unit lasted almost a year before it began doing the same thing. Now they say it's out of warranty. What a rip off!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ron A Schulze

customer_reviews.title: you still can hear but no visual makes the rear view cam useless, isn't there suppose to be some type of ...
customer_reviews.text: After year and a half screen went blank,you still can hear but no visual makes the rear view cam useless,isn't there suppose to be some type of warranty when you buy through Amazon?
customer_reviews.author: Dave Dee

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Haven't installed this yet, I'm having a tough time finding a wiring harness to fit my 2000 Saab 9-3 convertible. Came packaged well, and looks great! Wish I could say more about it. Maybe at a later date...
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Cassity

customer_reviews.title: This is a great stereo however I feel like there could be a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stereo however I feel like there could be a thing or two to improve and that would be the animation of the function and I mean by that is that there should be a few more options for instance the name of the song playing on bluetooth, Or the radio actually have a DVD player instead of AV In however defiantly like the AV out.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: No go
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have all the pieces to make it work in the car. I had to send it back. Unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jennit2486

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and your time and buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap! Got it for my daughter for Christmas and paid to have it installed. It has already randomly just quit working. No radio, no sound, no display, does not detect AV input. Hard reset and disconnected and re-connected power with no success. No product support available and of course no returns allowed after 30 days. I guess I will throw it in the trash and buy something else. Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Gee

product_meta.title: BOSS Audio Systems BV9976B Car DVD Player - Single Din, Bluetooth Audio and Calling, Built-in Microphone, CD-USB-SD-Aux-in-AM FM Radio Receiver, 7 Inch Digital LCD Display, Multi-color Illumination
product_meta.description: Style:7" Monitor DVD ReceiverCruise to your favorite tunes with the BOSS Audio BV9967B In-Dash audio system. Explore your musical options with the AM/FM radio, DVD/CD player, SD and USB ports and Auxiliary input for your smartphone. Bluetooth technology allows you to stream apps like Pandora and Spotify as well as safely make calls hands-free. When you reach your destination, you can easily detach the front panel and store it to deter theft. Control it all from the wireless remote, existing steering wheel controls (interface required, not included) and touchscreen monitor. Blast the miles away with great music with the BOSS Audio BV9967B. For further product details, please scroll down.
feature_bullets: Bluetooth - Answer/make calls and be hands-free with no distractions. The built-in microphone picks up your voice and your car speakers let you hear the person on the other side. Play and control your music and apps like Spotify/Pandora wirelessly

Media Playback - Play music through your Bluetooth device, pop in a CD/DVD or use the USB/SD ports. Digital media support include MP3 and WMA file formats. Tune into the AM/FM radio stations for up to date music/news/sports and more

Inputs - The USB/SD ports gives you the option to have a vast library of audio files at your fingertips. The auxiliary input is a convenient way to hook up to your MP3 player/device. USB charging available
Auxiliary - Compatible with the audio output from smartphones as well as MP3 players.

Outputs - Use the front & rear pre-amp outputs to hook up your speakers (front left / front right and rear left / rear right. The video output allows you to connect an extra screen for more viewing capability
Multi-Color Illumination - Set the mood and make your car into your very own sanctuary. With over 16 million color combinations, you can set a different tone every day of the week
Equalizer - Customize how you want to hear your music with the balance/fader/ bass and treble and control it all with the wireless remote control from either inside or outside of your vehicle

- BOSS Audio Systems provides a powerful 3-year Platinum Online Dealer so long as the purchase is made through . We strongly encourage professional installation of this product to ensure proper and safe functionality

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars1,749 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: DVD receiver - in-dash unit, Remote control
